subject: Software manager version 2.1
description_text:
Hi, what is the LEVEL OF FILTERING in the samsonn management software. Thank you 
Eric Fillion

conversations.body_text: Hi Eric Fillion,  The default filter level is Level 2. You can disable it to improve the signal response speed, especially in iRacing.

Ok than you
Eric Fillion

> Le 9 août 2025 à 11:09, service@simsonn.com a écrit :
> 
> ﻿
> Hi Eric Fillion,
> 
> The default filter level is Level 2. You can disable it to improve the signal response speed, especially in iRacing.
